name: D Kushwanth
title: Software Engineer | Full-Stack Developer
summary: Motivated and results-oriented Full-Stack Developer with practical experience in developing end-to-end applications using Java (Spring Boot), REST APIs, and PostgreSQL. Skilled in data structures, algorithms, and building scalable solutions with strong UI/UX using JavaScript, HTML, CSS. Demonstrated ability to translate academic concepts into real-world applications. Strong foundation in object-oriented programming, backed by internships and hands-on projects. Excellent communication skills and a continuous learner.

projects.title: Product Landing Page
description: Created a personal portfolio website with animated sections using AOS library.
Connected to PostgreSQL database with REST APIs for dynamic content management.
Built with Spring Boot backend and JavaScript Fetch API on frontend.
Ensured fully responsive layout with modern, clean design.

projects.title: Weather App
description: Fetched live weather data from public API using Fetch API.
Displayed real-time temperature and condition icons in a sleek UI.

projects.title: Quiz App
description: Built a general knowledge quiz with interactive UI and timer feature.
Used JavaScript to dynamically update questions and validate answers.
Implemented visual feedback and score tracking.

projects.title: To-Do List
description: Built a responsive to-do list app with task creation, editing, and completion tracking.
Used localStorage for persistent task data.
UI built with dynamic DOM manipulation and event handling.

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Created a fun interactive Rock-Paper-Scissors game with emoji-based UI.
Tracked scores, declared outcomes, and enabled game reset.
Managed game logic using conditional statements in JavaScript.

projects.title: Calculator
description: Designed a functional calculator with basic arithmetic operations.
Styled with CSS Grid for layout and JavaScript for logic handling.
Included additional features like percent and sign toggle.

experience.title: Java Developer (Remote)
description: Built Java-based academic systems including banking and student record applications.
Applied object-oriented programming with method overloading and exception handling.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer Intern
description: Developed a modern landing page and weather app using JavaScript and dynamic rendering.
